scripts.start:docker: npm run start:arium; npm run start:vda; npm run start:princeinsurance
scripts.dev:watch:arium: mkdir tmp; nodemon --watch dist --verbose --exec 'npm start -- --peer.address peer0.arium.com:7052 --chaincode-id-name vehicle-manufacture-chaincode:0 >> tmp/arium.log 2>&1'
scripts.dev:watch:vda: mkdir tmp; nodemon  --watch dist --verbose --exec 'npm start -- --peer.address peer0.vda.com:7052 --chaincode-id-name vehicle-manufacture-chaincode:0 >> tmp/vda.log 2>&1'
scripts.dev:watch:princeinsurance: mkdir tmp; nodemon --watch dist --verbose --exec 'npm start -- --peer.address peer0.prince-insurance.com:7052 --chaincode-id-name vehicle-manufacture-chaincode:0 >> tmp/prince.log 2>&1'
